trans-unit.source: A specialized <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> that provides the ability to model a conditional node with two outcomes.
trans-unit.target: 두 가지 결과가 있는 조건부 노드를 모델링하는 기능을 제공하는 특수화된 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> uses a condition and defines actions to take if the condition is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> 조건을 사용 하 고 조건에 해당 하는 경우 수행할 작업을 정의 `true` 또는 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> 노드를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 [순서도 활동 사용 하 여 TryCatch에서 오류 처리](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) 샘플.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The condition the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision" /> is testing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision" />에서 테스트하는 조건입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision" /> class with the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 조건을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> 노드를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 [순서도 활동 사용 하 여 TryCatch에서 오류 처리](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) 샘플.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the condition the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision" /> is testing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision" />에서 테스트하는 조건을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value expression that represents the condition.
trans-unit.target: 조건을 나타내는 값 식입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the condition evaluates to `true`, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode> in the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision.True%2A> property is executed.
trans-unit.target: 조건이를 반환 하는 경우 `true`, <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode> 에 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision.True%2A> 속성 실행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode> in the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision.False%2A> property is executed.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode> 속성의 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision.False%2A>가 실행됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates using the Condition property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> 노드의 Condition 속성을 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 [순서도 활동 사용 하 여 TryCatch에서 오류 처리](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) 샘플.

trans-unit.source: The name of this flow decision to be displayed in the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 활동 디자이너에 표시할 이 흐름 결정의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the flow decision.
trans-unit.target: 흐름 결정의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> that is executed when the condition evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 <see langword="false" />일 때 실행되는 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity that is executed when the condition evaluates to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 <see langword="false" />로 확인될 경우 실행되는 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the False property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> 노드의 False 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 [순서도 활동 사용 하 여 TryCatch에서 오류 처리](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) 샘플.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> that is executed when the condition evaluates to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 <see langword="true" />일 때 실행되는 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" />를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity to execute when the condition evaluates to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 <see langword="true" />로 확인될 경우 실행할 작업입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the True property of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 샘플에서는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowDecision> 노드의 True 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.
